kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Given I am on the home page
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: When I search for the product "Blouse"
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: I should see the searched product "Blouse"
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` appears on current page.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Strip String
kw.doc: Remove leading and/or trailing whitespaces from the given string.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.name: Scenario 02: Search for non existing products

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Given I am on the home page
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: When I search for the product "non existing product"
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'non existing product' into text field 'id:search_query_top'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I should see the message "No results were found for your search "non existing product""
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` appears on current page.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath://*[@id="center_column"]/p[@class="alert alert-warning"]' contains text 'non existing product'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Given I am on the home page

kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: When I select the "WOMEN" category in the main menu categories
Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering mouse over the element ``locator``.
kw.msg: Simulating Mouse Over on element 'css:#block_top_menu > ul > li:nth-child(1) > a'.

kw.name: And I select the sub-category "Summer Dresses"
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I should see the page with the selected product "Summer Dresses"
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` appears on current page.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Summer Dresses - My Store'.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Strip String
kw.doc: Remove leading and/or trailing whitespaces from the given string.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

arguments.arg: css:#center_column > ul > li > div > div.right-block > h5 > a
